data.title: Raphael Sbarge on LinkedIn: #10daysinwatts #streamingnow #streaming #mudtownfarms #watts
data.meta_description:
Our 4 part series is now available on streaming, on KCET.org, on PBS.org, YouTube, Hulu and others.   #10DaysinWatts 

We are very proud of this series, a love…
data.text: We are so honored and proud that 10 DAYS IN WATTS has won an #Emmy ! Thank you to the Academy and its members for this incredible recognition of our work. HUGE thank you to KCET (now PBS SoCal | KCET) for your commitment to great programming and for partnering on this wonderful project. Thank you Juan Devis, Angela Boisvert and Robert McDonnell for all you did to get us to this moment! Thank you to WLCAC and Tim Watkins, MudTown Farms, and the community of Watts, for sharing your stories so beautifully. And thank you to all the extraordinary filmmakers who brought their heart and soul to making this! Rick Pratt, Saga Elmohtaseb, Felipe Vara de Rey, Jenna DeAngeles, Peter Rundquist, Claire Walter, Caleb Mose, Chris Boyer, Anita M. Cal, Alex Gray and Rhazizi Ishakarah Thank you to Carole Shandler, Paula R Kendrick and the Green Wish board for making it all possible. We are all floating on air…!!
